column5: Plan on fishing the Rainey River out of Baudette, Mn in 2009, are there any Candian Web Sites available like here in the US where you can obtain your Non Res. Ontario Fishing License and Border Crossing Permit on line, didn't want to have to cross over into Canada just to get these??? Thanks
you can call the Ontario MNR at 800-667-1940 and order your license by phone and they will mail it to you...only took 1 week this past May..our whole group of 12 did it this way

Carl,Here's a link for for a site where you can print the application for the remote border crossing permit. http://www.canoecountry.com/rabc/Unless something has changed in the past few months, the permit has to be ordered by mail. The reason for this is they will want to have a copy of a U.S. government issued photo i.d. such as a drivers license or passport. Ours took about three weeks to process this past June. The permits are good for a year.NimstugOutside of a dog, a book is a man's best friend. Inside of a dog, it is too dark to read.-G. Marx
